filmography.title: Miracle on 34th Street
filmography.role_description: A harried shopper who scolds the Macy's Santa for promising her son a toy the store doesn't have; her uncredited film debut.
filmography.plot: When a nice old man who claims to be Santa Claus is institutionalized as insane, a young lawyer decides to defend him.

filmography.title: A Letter to Three Wives
filmography.role_description: A wisecracking maid who witnesses the domestic troubles of her employers and provides sharp commentary.
filmography.plot: A letter from the town flirt claims she has run off with one of three women's husbands, but doesn't say which one.

filmography.title: City Across the River
filmography.role_description: The hard-working, long-suffering mother of a juvenile delinquent involved in a murder.
filmography.plot: A member of a Brooklyn street gang gets involved in the murder of a high school teacher.

filmography.title: Father Was a Fullback
filmography.role_description: The outspoken housekeeper of a college football coach who isn't afraid to critique his losing streak.
filmography.plot: A college football coach struggles with a losing team and the romantic antics of his teenage daughters.

filmography.title: All About Eve
filmography.role_description: The cynical, sharp-tongued dresser and loyal companion to aging Broadway star Margo Channing.
filmography.plot: A timid but secretly ruthless ingénue insinuates herself into the life of an aging Broadway star.

filmography.title: The Mating Season
filmography.role_description: A hamburger stand owner who poses as a cook to be near her son and his new wealthy wife, saving their marriage.
filmography.plot: A working-class mother poses as a cook in her son's household to avoid embarrassing his new upper-class wife.

filmography.title: The Model and the Marriage Broker
filmography.role_description: A lonely, cynical marriage broker who tries to fix up a model while dealing with her own isolation; a rare leading role.
filmography.plot: A marriage broker decides to play cupid for a model and an X-ray technician, despite their resistance.

filmography.title: With a Song in My Heart
filmography.role_description: A tough but caring nurse who helps singer Jane Froman recover from a crippling plane crash.
filmography.plot: The true story of singer Jane Froman, who was severely injured in a plane crash but courageously made a comeback.

filmography.title: Titanic
filmography.role_description: A brassy, unsinkable socialite based on Molly Brown who befriends the struggling passengers aboard the doomed ship.
filmography.plot: An unhappily married couple struggle with their problems while on board the ill-fated ship.

filmography.title: Pickup on South Street
filmography.role_description: A weary street peddler and police informant who dreams of saving enough money for a proper burial.
filmography.plot: A pickpocket unwittingly lifts a message destined for enemy agents and becomes a target for a Communist spy ring.

filmography.title: The Farmer Takes a Wife
filmography.role_description: A colorful canal boat cook who helps Betty Grable navigate romance on the Erie Canal.
filmography.plot: A farmer works on the Erie Canal to earn money to buy a farm, but falls for a woman who loves the canal life.

filmography.title: Rear Window
filmography.role_description: The insurance company nurse who provides massages, homespun wisdom, and morbid theories to a wheelchair-bound photographer.
filmography.plot: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

filmography.title: Daddy Long Legs
filmography.role_description: The efficient, dry-witted secretary to a wealthy businessman who helps facilitate his secret sponsorship of an orphan.
filmography.plot: A wealthy American has a chance encounter with a young French woman and anonymously pays for her education.

filmography.title: Lucy Gallant
filmography.role_description: A wealthy, eccentric widow who becomes a loyal friend and backer to a woman building a fashion empire in an oil town.
filmography.plot: A jilted woman moves to an oil town and opens a high-end dress shop, attracting the attention of a rancher.

filmography.title: The Proud and Profane
filmography.role_description: A tough, dedicated Red Cross worker stationed in the Pacific during WWII who mentors a younger volunteer.
filmography.plot: A war widow joins the Red Cross in the Pacific hoping to find out how her husband died, but falls for a tough Marine officer.

filmography.title: A Hole in the Head
filmography.role_description: The nagging but well-meaning sister-in-law of a carefree widower who tries to force him to settle down.
filmography.plot: A widower father runs a small Miami hotel and tries to keep his business afloat while raising his son.

filmography.title: Pillow Talk
filmography.role_description: The hungover, advice-dispensing maid of a wealthy interior decorator who listens in on her employer's party line.
filmography.plot: A womanizing songwriter and an interior decorator share a telephone party line and despise each other, until he poses as a Texan to woo her.

filmography.title: The Misfits
filmography.role_description: The supportive, older friend of a fragile divorcée who accompanies her to Reno for her divorce.
filmography.plot: A divorcée falls for an over-the-hill cowboy who struggles to maintain his romantically independent lifestyle in early-sixties Nevada.

filmography.title: The Second Time Around
filmography.role_description: A ranch owner who befriends a widow moving out West, helping her navigate frontier life.
filmography.plot: A widow leaves New York for Arizona in 1912 and becomes a sheriff to support her children.

filmography.title: Birdman of Alcatraz
filmography.role_description: The possessive, controlling mother of Robert Stroud who fights for his release but ultimately stifles his life.
filmography.plot: A surly convicted murderer held in permanent isolation redeems himself when he becomes a renowned bird expert.

filmography.title: How the West Was Won
filmography.role_description: A pioneer woman seeking a husband on a wagon train heading west, providing comic relief in the epic saga.
filmography.plot: A family saga covering several decades of Westward expansion in the 19th century, including the Gold Rush and the Civil War.

filmography.title: For Love or Money
filmography.role_description: A wealthy widow who hires a lawyer to manage the romantic lives of her three headstrong daughters.
filmography.plot: A widow hires a lawyer to keep her three daughters away from men she deems unsuitable.

filmography.title: A New Kind of Love
filmography.role_description: A fashion industry colleague who travels to Paris and gets involved in the romantic misadventures of the leads.
filmography.plot: A fashion copycat and a journalist meet in Paris and fall in love, assuming different identities.

filmography.title: Move Over, Darling
filmography.role_description: The mother-in-law caught in the middle of a marriage mix-up when her son's first wife returns from the dead.
filmography.plot: A woman missing for five years returns home on the day her husband is marrying another woman.

filmography.title: Boeing, Boeing
filmography.role_description: The harried, long-suffering housekeeper struggling to manage her boss's rotating schedule of three stewardess fiancées.
filmography.plot: A journalist living in Paris deceives three flight attendants into thinking they are each his one and only fiancée.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Supporting Actress

filmography.title: The Incident
filmography.role_description: An elderly wife held hostage on a subway car by two hoodlums, trying to protect her husband.
filmography.plot: Two young hoodlums terrorize the passengers of a New York City subway car.
